EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory at (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of the production‐section for converting copper plates into copper cable:
• Cable Factory Input Chest located at (2.5, 17.5) that feeds the factory.
• Factory Burner Inserter placed at (3.5, 17.5) (installed in Step 211) to transfer materials.
• Assembling Machine at (1.5, 19.5) which processes inputs into copper cable.
• Additional Burner Inserter at (1.5, 17.5) (fuelled with coal) supplying the assembling machine.

### Depot Belt Network at (3.5, 15.5)
This structure provides an isolated belt depot for interfacing with the extraction system:
• Depot Wooden Chest (belt depot) crafted and placed at (3.5, 15.5) (Step 214).
• Dedicated Transport Belt Segment positioned adjacent to the chest at (4.5, 15.5) (Step 215).
• Depot Burner Inserter placed at (3.5, 14.5) using direction UP (Step 216) to serve as the transfer node.

### Extraction System Interface at (–3.5, 27.5)
This element serves as the connection point for remote extraction:
• Extraction System Burner Inserter retrieved at (–3.5, 27.5) with its drop position at (–3.5, 28.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Errors in connecting transport belts (occurred in Steps 210, 211, 213, 214, 215, 216, and 217):
 – Transport belts were being connected directly to an entity of type Prototype.SteamEngine.
  Tip: Always route the belt connection through an inserter that serves as the valid target for input into a SteamEngine.

• Placement errors for wooden chests:
 – In one instance the target (3.5, 15.5) was too far from the player’s position (distance 15.89 vs. max 10).
 – In another case, placement failed due to the wooden chest not being available in the inventory.
  Tip: Ensure you are within the allowed placement range and verify that the required item is present in the inventory before attempting placement.

• Variable reference error:
 – A NameError occurred because ‘target_chest’ was not defined.
  Tip: Check variable names carefully and define or use the correct identifier when referencing an entity.
